page.title: List of people of the Spanish Civil War

revision.text:
{{short description|Wikipedia list article}} This is a list of notable people associated with the [[Spanish Civil War]].
==Figures identified with the Nationalist side== ===Military=== *[[Francisco Franco]] (Spain) *[[Miguel Cabanellas]] (Spain) *[[José Sanjurjo]] (Spain) *[[Emilio Mola]] (Spain) *[[Gonzalo Queipo de Llano]] (Spain) *[[Juan Yagüe]] (Spain) *[[José Enrique Varela]] (Spain) *[[Rafael García Valiño]] (Spain) *[[Joaquín García Morato]] (Spain) *[[Luis Carrero Blanco]] (Spain) *[[Fidel Dávila]] (Spain) *[[José Millán Astray]] (Spain) *[[José Antonio Primo de Rivera]] (Spain) *[[Heli Rolando de Tella y Cantos]] (Spain) *[[Carlos Asensio Cabanillas]] (Spain) *[[Antonio Castejón Espinosa]] (Spain) *[[Mohammed ben Mizzian]] (Spanish Morocco) *[[Eoin O'Duffy]] (Ireland) *[[Hugo Sperrle]] (Germany) *[[Wilhelm Ritter von Thoma]] (Germany) *[[Adolf Galland]] (Germany) *[[Werner Mölders]] (Germany) *[[Wilhelm Balthasar]] (Germany) *[[Walter Oesau]] (Germany) *[[Herbert Ihlefeld]] (Germany) *[[Günther Lützow]] (Germany) *[[Hajo Herrmann]] (Germany) *[[Hannes Trautloft]] (Germany) *[[Heinrich Trettner]] (Germany) *[[Wolfram Freiherr von Richthofen]] (Germany) *[[Mario Roatta]] (Italy) *[[Ettore Bastico]] (Italy) *[[Mario Berti]] (Italy) *[[Gastone Gambara]] (Italy) *[[Amedeo Guillet]] (Italy)
===Other=== *[[Ramiro de Maeztu]], assassinated *[[José María Gironella]] *[[Dionisio Ridruejo]] *[[Ernesto Giménez Caballero]] *[[José María Pemán]] *[[Gerardo Diego]] *[[Pedro Muñoz Seca]], assassinated *[[Josep Pla]] *[[Dámaso Alonso]] *[[Ramiro Ledesma Ramos]], executed *[[Rafael Sánchez Mazas]] *[[Roy Campbell (poet)|Roy Campbell]] *[[Juan March Ordinas]] *[[Pedro Laín Entralgo]] *[[Wenceslao Fernández Flórez]] *[[Luis Rosales]] *[[Ramón Gómez de la Serna]] *[[Salvador Dalí]] *[[Juan de la Cierva]] *[[Gonzalo Torrente Ballester]] *[[José Antonio Maravall]] *[[Álvaro Cunqueiro]] *[[Ramón Serrano Súñer]] *[[Pío Baroja]] *[[Azorín]] *[[Leopoldo Panero]] *[[Ernesto Halffter]] *[[Concha Espina]] *[[Ramón Pérez de Ayala]] *[[Eduardo Marquina]] *[[Pedro Sainz Rodríguez]] *[[Eugeni d'Ors]] *[[José Ortega y Gasset]] *[[Jacinto Benavente]] *[[Miguel Delibes]] *[[Camilo José Cela]] *[[Manuel Machado y Ruiz|Manuel Machado]] *[[Joaquín Rodrigo]]
==Figures identified with the Republican side== ===Politicians or military=== *[[Manuel Azaña]] (Republican) *[[Santiago Carrillo]] (Communist) *[[Lluis Companys]] (Republican/Catalanist) *[[Buenaventura Durruti]] (Anarchist) *[[Francisco Sabaté Llopart]] (Anarchist) *[[Juan García Oliver]] (Anarchist) *[[Federica Montseny]] (Anarchist) *[[José Giral|José Giral Pereira]] (Republican) *[[Valentin González]] (''"El Campesino"'') (Communist) *[[Dolores Ibarruri]] (''"La Pasionaria"'') (Communist) *[[Georges Kopp]] (Communist) *[[Mehmet Shehu]] (Communist) *[[Ernő Gerő]] (Communist) *[[Ferenc Münnich]] (Communist) *[[Sergey Gritsevets]] (Communist) *[[Lev Shestakov]] (Communist) *[[Francisco Largo Caballero]] (Socialist) *[[Enrique Líster]] (Communist) *[[Julio Mangada]] (Government) *[[Diego Martínez Barrio]] (Republican) *[[José Miaja]] (Government) *[[Juan Negrín]] (Socialist) *[[Andrés Nin]] (Communist) *[[Indalecio Prieto]] (Socialist) *[[Melchor Rodriguez Garcia]] (Anarchist) *[[Vicente Rojo Lluch]] (Government) *[[Luis Monguió]] (Diplomat; fought in Army)
===Others (including volunteers)=== *[[W. H. Auden]] *[[Claud Cockburn]] *[[Joaquín Arderíus]] *[[Norman Bethune]], Canadian doctor *[[Pedro García Cabrera]] *[[Federico García Lorca]], assassinated poet *[[Fernando Gerassi]] *[[Pablo Picasso]], plastic artist *[[Ernest Hemingway]], American writer *[[John Dos Passos]], American writer *[[Miguel Hernández]], captive poet *[[Laurie Lee]] *[["Yank" Levy]] *[[André Malraux]] *[[George Orwell]], British volunteer and writer *[[James Robertson Justice]] *[[Henri Rol-Tanguy]] *[[Adolfo Sánchez Vázquez]] *[[Karol Świerczewski]] *[[Tristan Tzara]], founder of Dadaism
==Others== *[[Emma Goldman]], anarchist writer *[[Ilya Ehrenburg]] *[[Samuel Krafsur]] *[[Ethel MacDonald]], anarchist propagandist *[[Carl Marzani]] *[[Robert Miller (accused spy)|Robert Miller]] *[[Ture Nerman]], Swedish Communist *[[Pablo Neruda]], Chilean communist, poet and diplomat in Spain and France *[[Kim Philby]] *[[Ludwig Renn]] *[[Egon Erwin Kisch]] *[[Arthur Koestler]] *[[Aleksandr Mikhailovich Orlov|Alexander Orlov]] *[[Langston Hughes]] *[[Nicolas Guillen]] *[[Martha Gellhorn]] *[[Eddie August Schneider]], American pilot *[[Bert Acosta]], American pilot *[[Frank Glasgow Tinker]], American pilot *[[Robert Brasillach]] *[[Georges Bernanos]]
[[Category:People of the Spanish Civil War| ]] [[Category:Spanish Civil War-related lists|People]] [[Category:Lists of people by association|Spanish Civil War]]
